page.title: 14Church Life-Malpas Area
page.content: All churches in the area have{ {Sunday Schools}except St.David Lewis (Catholic children receive instruction at school).Some Sunday Schools are for adults as well as children.{ { Services}are held in churches{every {Sunday.}More people attend most of these churches now than 10 years ago. Church membership varies from 10-250. { Activities}organised in the the churches include brownies,guides, scouts , youth clubs , young mothers groups,senior citizen clubs,ladies groups and missionary meetings. Non-church members may join any of these activities. {Prayer meetings}and{Bible Study groups are also held during the week in many churches.Many of the people worshipping in these churches do not live in Malpas or Bettws. Keri Russel 4A
